data.name: RPGScenery - Dwarven Hall Scene
data.detailed_description:
Stepping out of the narrow corridor, a huge hall welcomes you. Its ceiling is held high by 3-man-thick stone columns. The edges of the hall are lost on shadow, the middle is covered by the light of huge bonfires held by dwarf statues. The stone carvings could represent mighty heroes or gods. At the end of the hall stands another statue protecting the entrance to the more hidden parts of the dwarven empire.

This DLC contains 4 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
